name: Auri's Tales
description:
Auri’s Tales is a tiny 3D adventure game in which players will need to solve linear and non linear quests to get access to the castle and complete the game. The whole game will be contained in one single level that works as a mini open world that players can freely explore and evokes to the classic 3D platformers.

Jim Henson's Labyrinth, Alice in Wonderland, The Little Prince, Zelda I, Mario 64, Conker Reloaded or Dark Souls are some of the influences that inspire this game in different ways.
